analysis.description:
UTEMIS.fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0x979ebc09e55ea0ab563cf7175e4c4b1a03afc19a.sol#288-326) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amount_actually_invested == 0

UTEMIS.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0x979ebc09e55ea0ab563cf7175e4c4b1a03afc19a.sol#59-61)
UTEMIS.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0x979ebc09e55ea0ab563cf7175e4c4b1a03afc19a.sol#58-59)
